2018.2.42784+

STR:

  1. Create a new user on staging/dev and add it to jetbrains-team
  2. Log in as user from previous step
  3. Go to any OPS issue (e.g. /issue/OPS-100)
  4. Type some text into comment form and press Add comment

AR: 403 Forbidden message pop-up
ER: comment form should not be visible, since jetbrains-team users do not have Create Comment permission in OPS (IT Stuff on Hub provides only YouTrack reader role). Note how comment form is not visible in old MPS UI.

NOTE: the same reproduces on card on agiles as well.

build 42571

STR:
1) Install some custom widgets (for example, Cats Widget)
2) Go to project overview page
3) Try to add new widget here

AR:
There're only defalut widgets in dropdown, no new (custom) widgets

4) Go to Dashboard and add new widgets here
5) Return to project overview and Copy widgets from dashboard

AR:
Widgets are shown with error:

STR:

  1. Start YT on db with some custom widgets on project overview
  2. Go to this overview

AR:
